pageContext.claim: “We're down 78 percent at the border. And nobody thought that was possible.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's figure reflects the biggest possible decline even though it measures figures from before he became president, and does not use the most up-to-date data. While monthly and annual figures are susceptible to cherry-picking, the decline under his presidency is as low as 8 percent, and the decline in June 2017 compared with June 2016 is 52.6 percent.
